rules.name: Check EDDF odd RFL
rules.condition: dep == 'EDDF' and sidwpt in ['TOBAK', 'ANEKI', 'CINDY', 'KOMIB', 'SULUS'] and rfl % 2000 == 0

rules.name: Check EDDF even RFL
rules.condition: dep == 'EDDF' and sidwpt in ['OBOKA', 'MARUN', 'SOBRA', 'ULKIG'] and rfl % 2000 != 0
dep == 'EDDF' and sidwpt == 'ANEKI' and (arr == 'EDDM' or arr == 'EDDN')
